member.summary: Gets or sets optional place holder text, this can be a translation key

member.summary: If this library monitors for folders or files

member.summary: Gets or sets if this library will use fingerprinting to determine if a file already is known

member.summary: Gets or sets if hidden files and folders should be excluded from the library

member.summary: The timespan of when this was last scanned

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to scan files

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to wait before checking for file size changes when scanning the library
